mapper.select: SELECT e.exp_code ,e.animal_code ,e.m_exp_id ,e.exp_cost ,mi.m_info_name ,mi.m_info_gender ,mi.m_info_birth ,mi.m_info_address ,mi.m_info_phone ,e.m_shelter_id_accept ,ep.exp_period_level ,os2.os_name AS os_code_exp ,os3.os_name AS os_code_cost_return ,e.exp_purpose ,e.exp_reserve_request_date ,e.exp_check_date ,e.exp_start_date ,e.exp_end_date ,os1.os_name AS os_code_animal ,a.animal_id_code ,a.animal_breed ,a.animal_weight ,a.animal_age FROM t_exp e INNER JOIN t_member m ON e.m_exp_id = m.m_id INNER JOIN t_member_info mi ON m.m_info_code = mi.m_info_code INNER JOIN t_exp_period ep ON e.exp_period_code = ep.exp_period_code INNER JOIN t_overall_status os2 ON e.os_code_exp = os2.os_code INNER JOIN t_overall_status os3 ON e.os_code_cost_return = os3.os_code INNER JOIN t_animal a ON e.animal_code = a.animal_code INNER JOIN t_overall_status os1 ON a.os_code_animal = os1.os_code WHERE e.exp_code = #{expCode}

SELECT e.exp_code AS expCode ,e.m_exp_id AS mExpId ,m_shelter_id_accept AS mShelterIdAccept ,os.os_name AS osName ,e.exp_reserve_request_date AS expReserveRequestDate FROM t_exp e INNER JOIN t_overall_status os ON e.os_code_exp = os.os_code WHERE e.bl_code=#{blCode} ORDER BY e.exp_reserve_request_date DESC

SELECT a.animal_breed ,a.animal_weight ,a.animal_age ,e.exp_code ,e.m_shelter_id_accept ,e.exp_journal_count ,e.exp_cost ,e.exp_purpose ,e.exp_reserve_request_date ,e.exp_start_date ,e.exp_end_date ,os.os_name AS os_code_exp ,bl.bl_shelter_name ,bl.bl_shelter_address FROM t_exp e INNER JOIN t_animal a ON e.animal_code = a.animal_code INNER JOIN t_business_license bl ON e.bl_code = bl.bl_code INNER JOIN t_overall_status os ON e.os_code_exp = os.os_code WHERE e.exp_code = #{expCode}

SELECT a.animal_breed, e.exp_reserve_request_date, e.exp_start_date, e.exp_end_date, e.exp_code, os.os_name FROM t_exp e INNER JOIN t_animal a ON e.animal_code = a.animal_code INNER JOIN t_overall_status os ON e.os_code_exp = os.os_code WHERE e.m_exp_id = #{mExpId} ORDER BY exp_reserve_request_date DESC
